name: angular-zen-mode
description: Angular Zen Mode is an extension that streamlines angular developers' development experience when programming in angular-specific files (component code/template/style). It does this by creating a workspace editor group configuration which opens the component code, template, and style file all together.

angular-zen-mode.StyleFormats.description: The file extensions which angular-zen-mode should search to find a style file for the specific component
angular-zen-mode.StyleFormats.title: Component Style File Extensions

angular-zen-mode.TemplateFormats.description: The file extensions which angular-zen-mode should search to find a template file for the specific component
angular-zen-mode.TemplateFormats.title: Component Template File Extensions

angular-zen-mode.WatchMode.description: If true, then angular-zen-mode will detect when a new compontent ts/template/style file is open and automatically open the other two files in the zen mode
angular-zen-mode.WatchMode.title: Watch Mode

angular-zen-mode.ZoomOutCount.description: The amount of times angular-zen-mode will zoom out by 20% when entering zen mode
angular-zen-mode.ZoomOutCount.title: Zoom Out Count

angular-zen-mode.UseBuiltInZen.description: Whether to use the built-in zen mode for VS code when entering Angular Zen Mode, if true, then instead of simply hiding the sidebar, the extention will toggle VS Code's built in zen mode.
angular-zen-mode.UseBuiltInZen.title: Use Built-in Zen Mode

angular-zen-mode.ThirdFileBelow.description: Whether to open the third file (ts/template/style) in an editor below the second file. If false, then the third file will be opened in a column to the side instead of underneath
angular-zen-mode.ThirdFileBelow.title: Open Third Editor Below

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
